trends: There have been no other sightings in Iron River
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Round and luminous white w/ slight hint of green glowing around edge
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile traveling west in vehicle my wife and I observed large luminous circle which appeared to be falling extremely fast. The object stopped and traveled North we attempted to follow it on a side road but object changed direction south, I turned around and followed for 2-3 minutes on a south bound road object appeared to hover and pulsate thru the tree line with a slight green color around the edges. I turned my vehicle around and left the area quickly. When the object hovered I became very afraid and was compelled to leave the area quickly. My wife has been up to this moment been an avid skeptic of the unexplainable. She was trembling in fear. My wife and I did not have a camera in the car at the time.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
